GerudoDesertTreasure_Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Link,<sp:5:0:0> did you find the desert treasure?


"Seek out the swordswoman upon the
sand and look to where she points—
there is treasure waiting underground."
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There are countless swordswomen statues
in this desert. The only option might be to
see where each one directs you...
GerudoDesertTreasure_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Link, is that the treasure the old
document mentioned?
GerudoDesertTreasure_Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Admiration_00>I see... So, the treasure was armor
affiliated with the ancient Gerudo...

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I knew you'd be able to find it. <sp:5:0:0>Take it
with you, and make good use of it.
GerudoDesertTreasure_Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Link, the helm you're wearing... Is it the
treasure the old document mentioned?
GerudoDesertTreasure_Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>What? The helm you're wearing...<sp:5:0:0>
That's the treasure mentioned in that
old document?
Talk_10:
I imagine that once you've found the fifth
sage, you'll be setting out to confront the
Demon King...
I'll be prepared for when that battle
comes. You can count on me!
GerudoDesertTreasure_Near_00: Now that I think about it...
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Understand_00>I will do my best to learn more of what is
happening with Zelda before we meet
again. Make sure to come back and visit!
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Oh, and don't forget... Even when I
cannot be by your side, you can always
call on my power as a sage.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Link! I'm glad to see you!<sp:0:4:0>Have you been to Lookout Landing yet?
I sent Buliara there. <sp:5:1:0>If you find her, say hi
for me, OK?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I haven't gotten any new information
about Zelda. It seems she hasn't been
around here recently.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Link! I'm glad to see you here! <sp:5:0:0>Are you
finding my new power as a sage helpful?
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I haven't found any clues about the fifth
sage yet, but I'm not about to give up!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I don't know if you'll find this information
helpful, but...
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>What? You found the fifth sage?


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Interesting. So she's an ancient Zonai
named Mineru...

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>And even though she's lost her original
body, she's pledged to fight alongside us
as the Sage of Spirit!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Link! It's good to see you. How are the
preparations to defeat the Demon King
coming along?
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand>As sages, our power is yours.<sp:5:1:0> All that
remains now is for you to defeat the
Demon King.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>You're a welcome sight, Link! And how
is the search for the fifth sage going?
Her name was...Mineru?
GerudoDesertTreasure_Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>After I became a sage and returned
to town, I discovered an interesting
ancient reference...
"Seek out the swordswoman upon the
sand and look to where she points—
there is treasure waiting underground."
That was written in an old document
I discovered.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I doubt it holds any connection to Zelda,
but it might be a clue to something...

The swordswoman upon the sand...<sp:5:0:0>
Treasure underground...<sp:5:0:0> It could be worth
looking into.
